Module mcewen.mainform

Class ModifyPartController

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyPartController
public class ModifyPartController extends Object
This class loads the modify part form.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onModifyPartCancelB(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    When called, this method takes the user back to the main menu without saving any changes made.
    void
    onModifyPartSaveB(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method grabs data from the text fields and updates a part with the new data.
    void
    onMpInhouseRB(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method selects the InHouse radio button and sets the last text field to Machine id when called.
    void
    onMpOutsourcedRB(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method selects the Outsourced radio button and sets the last text field to Company name when called.
    void
    sendParts(Part parts)
    This method sends the parts data into their respective text fields from the main menu.

    • sendParts

      public void sendParts(Part parts)
      This method sends the parts data into their respective text fields from the main menu.
      Parameters:
      parts - The selected part passed over from the main menu

    • onModifyPartCancelB

      public void onModifyPartCancelB(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      When called, this method takes the user back to the main menu without saving any changes made.
      Parameters:
      event - The cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException - input/output exception

    • onModifyPartSaveB

      public void onModifyPartSaveB(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method grabs data from the text fields and updates a part with the new data.
      Parameters:
      event - The save button
      Throws:
      IOException - input/output exception

    • onMpInhouseRB
